statements.name: PROC SCOREACCEL
statements.description: Publishes, executes, or deletes a model in CAS or an external data source.

statements.name: DELETEMODEL
statements.description: Deletes a model from CAS or an external data source.

statements.name: PUBLISHMODEL
statements.description: Publishes a model in CAS or an external data source.
statements.help:
PUBLISHMODEL 
CASLIB="caslib"
MODELNAME="model-name"                     
MODELTYPE=DATASTEP | DS2
MODELTABLE="model-table" | 
                     "caslib.model-table" | "schema.model-table"
STOREFILES=file-specification | PROGRAMFILE=file-specification
VARXMLFILE=file-path
<publish-model-optional-arguments>                   ;

statements.name: RUNMODEL
statements.description: Runs a model in CAS or an external data source.
